page.title: 12Bridge House
page.content: {Bridge House}is a large, modern three storey building in Flookburgh. It is an old folks home, built in 1978 by the Social Services,on the site of an old bowling green. There are 42 single bedrooms,several television lounges,spacious kitchens and the toilets/bathrooms are equipped with special aids. A large,caring staff are in constant attendance to ensure a high standard of care. Residents,contribute their pensions for their keep,ut still have some money to buy small luxuries. Coach outings and entertainments are provided at regular intervals.Visitors are encouraged. The aim of the house is to give the old people a warm,caring environment so that they are comfortable,secure and happy.
